snippet: The Mets reached a deal, which is contingent on R. A. Dickey and the Blue Jays’ agreeing on a contract extension during a 72-hour negotiating window, to send the 38-year-old-knuckleballer to the Blue Jays.
abstract: New York Mets agree in principal to trade pitcher R A Dickey to Toronto Blue Jays; deal is contingent on Dickey and Blue Jays agreeing on a contract extension during a 72-hour negotiating window.
lead_paragraph: The Mets reached a deal, which is contingent on R. A. Dickey and the Blue Jays’ agreeing on a contract extension during a 72-hour negotiating window, to send the 38-year-old-knuckleballer to the Blue Jays.

headline.seo: Mets Agree to Trade Cy Young Winner R.A. Dickey to Blue Jays
headline.main: Mets Agree to Trade Dickey, a Cy Young Winner, to Toronto
headline.print_headline: Mets Agree to Trade Dickey, a Cy Young Winner, to Toronto
